message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $14,000. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Could we discuss a price closer to $10,000?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I'm confident this product offers significant value beyond your initial assessment. Could you consider $13,000?

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I understand the value of the product, I'm still looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to discuss a price closer to $11,000?
